ygData.subject: rivervale
ygData.msgSnippet: i ve found out the hard way that the critters just inside rivervale are rather big. the first sherrif you encounter can hit for in excess of 100 damage per hit
ygData.messageBody:
i've found out the hard way that the critters just inside rivervale are
rather big. the first sherrif you encounter can hit for in excess of 100
damage per hit (while this was when i was about lvl 7, i dont imagine his
damage will go down THAT much with chain armor). the only other way into
rivervale is to take a long detour and get to misty thicket, but if i hear
correctly there are several wandering and stationary guards there as well.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
